desc: Cocktail today. Feel fine tomorrow! Hydrate and energize while sipping your favorite cocktail. Solie is a cocktail mix with a balanced combination of clean electrolytes, vitamins, and antioxidants that delivers hydration and immune support with a natural energy boost. Feel good about that drink!

layout.text: Feel the energy boost and hydration support of clean electrolytes, vitamins, and anti-oxidants. Always free of sugar, stevia and artificial ingredients. Just add Solie to your next cocktail to feel the difference.
